content: That final Gourd upgrade requires you to have already levelled up your Gourd to 9 Healing Charges. You can then interact with the NPC at Furnace Valley - Rakshasa Palace in Flaming Mountains to get the final upgrade.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Old Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
That final Gourd upgrade requires you to have already levelled up your Gourd to 9 Healing Charges. You can then interact with the NPC at Furnace Valley - Rakshasa Palace in Flaming Mountains to get the final upgrade.
